control.description: Group recording items by folder structure

control.visible: $EXP[isVideo] | $EXP[isMovie] | $EXP[isTvshow] | $EXP[isSeason] | $EXP[isEpisode] | $EXP[isSet] | $EXP[isMusicvideo] | Container.Content(files) | Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(episodes) | Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(musicvideos) | Container.Content(videos)

$EXP[isVideo] | $EXP[isMovie] | $EXP[isTvshow] | $EXP[isSeason] | $EXP[isEpisode] | $EXP[isSet] | $EXP[isMusicvideo] | Container.Content(files) | Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(episodes) | Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(musicvideos) | Container.Content(videos) | Window.IsActive(tvrecordings)
